summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6260 for the improvement of Southwest Forney Street from 49th Ave. Southwest to 51st Ave. Southwest; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing a sanitary sewer system and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 90786, and levying and assessing the amounts against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
